channel.title: Praxis on Stephen D. O'Connell
channel.description: Recent content in Praxis on Stephen D. O'Connell

item.title: Targeting unconditional cash transfers to Syrian refugees in Lebanon
item.description: In collaboration with UNHCR and UN-WFP, my team (Onur Altındağ, Bentley University; Aytuğ Şaşmaz, Harvard University; Zeynep Balcıoğlu, Northeastern University) and I contribute to the design of the targeting system for over USD300 million of annual unconditional cash and in-kind assistance to Syrian refugees in Lebanon. A manuscript related to this work is available in research.
